department.ch: 化學工程與材料工程學系

goal.en: 本課程從能帶理論開始，介紹材料中電子的傳輸，並探討其對材料電性的影響，最後並配合元件的探討了解其應用。
goal.ch: 本課程從能帶理論開始，介紹材料中電子的傳輸，並探討其對材料電性的影響，最後並配合元件的探討了解其應用。

content.en:
"Week 1 Introduction & Band Theory
Week 2 Semiconductor (intrinsic and extrinsic)
Week 3 Semiconductor (temperature dependence of conductivity) (9/24 no class)
Week 4 Semiconductor (recombination, diffusion and Schottky diode)
Week 5 Semiconductor (Ohmic contact) (10/10 no class)
Week 6 Quiz #1 & Semiconductor (direct and indirect bandgap)
Week 7 Devices (p-n junction)
Week 8 Devices (p-n junction)
Week 9 Devices (LED) & Midterm Exam
Week 10 Devices (solar cell)
Week 11 Devices (laser) (11/21 no class)
Week 12 Structure of Ceramics
Week 13 Structure of Ceramics
Week 14 Quiz #2 and Dielectric Materials (permittvity, polarization)
Week 15 Dielectric Materials (polarization mechanisms and dielectric loss)
Week 16 Dielectric Materials (dielectric strength and capacitor)
Week 17 Dielectric Materials (piezo-, ferro- and pyroelectricity)
Week 18 Final Exam (TBD)"
